room_title: Escape room "Do Not Disturb" by Breakout Games - Columbus in Columbus
review: We booked 2 escape rooms as a team building activity for our company - we had 3 people in "Do Not Disturb" and 4 people in "Mystery Mansion." Both rooms were GREAT! Many of us had never done an escape room before, and it definitely seems like there is a learning curve in learning about how to look for clues, how to decipher them, etc. Both teams were too stubborn to ask for clues from the "moderator" until about 20-30 minutes in, but the clues that they gave when asked were extremely helpful. I would definitely do this again, either as team building or a fun night out with friends!
